desc: Clothing, jewelry and art boutique in Burlington, VT, specializing in sustainable fashion, local fashion and handmade jewelry, art and gifts

layout.text:
Shop our collection of carefully curated clothing and creations, in beautiful downtown Burlington, VT! By shopping here, you are supporting the individual artists and designers who create the magic that you see. We are currently open with safety precautions enforced, so bring your mask and visit us at 207 College St, or order from us on this here website!
Let’s keep art and small business alive in these uncertain times ❤️
